name: knotted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
joined by having been tied together in a knot, or containing a knot or knots: a knotted rope a knotted handkerchief See
knot
More examplesFewer examplesHer boots were laced up with knotted string.youths in long black overcoats and white knotted scarvesHe was wearing a nice, clean shirt and neatly knotted tie.
